thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Fred Harris

author: Fred Harris
title: Fred Harris
text:
Wow, PolicyGenius is a very proficient, efficient, complete professional service.
I rarely conduct business online, nevertheless, I thought I would give PolicyGenius a shot. Indeed Im so very happy I did. I found the experience very pleasant and complete. All communications were followed up , thorough and complete. The representative made certain I had a clear understanding of all documents and flawless guidance through the complete application process. Although the transaction has been complete I still receive comforting follow up communications.
I definitely would recommend PolicyGenius to anyone seeking coverage for themselves and or there family.
